creator: sykora@seznam.cz
text:
I am not able to determine how ant handles System.in stream. When I create 
small program, which just reads data from System.in and print them to 
System.out, he doesn't print anything.
Program is ran by <java classname="Reader" fork="true"> (I have to use fork !).
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 2738 ***
creator: bodewig@apache.org
